title.full: シャイニング　ブラッド shining blood
title.reduced: シャイニング　ブラッド shining blood

description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This is a 3D robot shooter game.  Fight till the end in a magnificent red lit and shining world.  The shields, throwing back the attacks, are key to victory.  Exhilarating high-speed combat. Defeat the boss to win the battle.
description.short: This is a 3D robot shooter game.  Fight till the end in a magnificent red lit and shining world.  The shields, throwing back the attacks, are key to victory.  Exhilarating high-speed combat. Defeat the boss to win the battle.
